[Cloud API Overview](overview) &gt; [@adpt/cloud](./cloud.md) &gt; [action](./cloud.action.md)

## action namespace

Action library for implementing simple primitive components.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Action](./cloud.action.action.md) | Component that can be inherited to perform actions during deploy |
|  [Command](./cloud.action.command.md) | Primitive component that can be used to interact with commands via the OS shell to implement actions in Adapt. |

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [isShouldActDetail(val)](./cloud.action.isshouldactdetail.md) | Type guard for [action.ShouldActDetail](./cloud.action.shouldactdetail.md)<!-- -->. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ActionContext](./cloud.action.actioncontext.md) | Helper information for an [action.Action](./cloud.action.action.md) component. |
|  [CommandProps](./cloud.action.commandprops.md) | Properties for the [Command](./cloud.action.command.md) component. |
|  [ShouldActDetail](./cloud.action.shouldactdetail.md) | Detailed information on why an action should be taken. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ShouldAct](./cloud.action.shouldact.md) | Return type for [action.Action.shouldAct()](./cloud.action.action.shouldact.md) that describes whether an action should be taken and why. |
